solution_line_template: Since dogs have {legs_per_dog} legs, then {num_dogs} dogs have a total of {num_dogs} x {legs_per_dog} = <<{num_dogs}*{legs_per_dog}={dog_legs}>>{dog_legs} legs.
So, there are {dog_legs} dog legs + {chicken_legs} chicken legs = <<{dog_legs}+{chicken_legs}={total_legs}>>{total_legs} legs in all.
